body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarMart Shipping Services. My name is Jose Bennett. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Emily. To assist you better, could you provide me with your phone number, starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, four two zero, eight seven six nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emily. Can you also confirm your home address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's three zero zero Maple Street, Apt one zero zero two, Citysville, Stateston, Zipcode one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Emily. I understand you have concerns about the shipping process. Rest assured, we will do our best to make it a smooth experience for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that. I've never shipped a car before, so I'm feeling a bit nervous.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Emily. We'll keep you informed every step of the way. If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to me. Thank you for your time.
